definition: chip (in gambling)/token (for counting)/ticket/to prepare/to plan/to raise (funds)/resource/means
to handle/to manage/to put in order/to arrange/to administer/to execute/to take action on/to plan

sentences.english: Virtually every new company complains about the difficulty of raising seed capital.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，每家新公司都在抱怨筹措原始资本的困难性。

sentences.english: They helped Mr. Pei and his colleague organize funding for teacher workshops.
sentences.chinese: 他们帮助裴东光和他的同事筹措了教师培训的资金。

sentences.english: Since the Tang Dynasty In China, the government used the loan system to collect revenue.
sentences.chinese: 中国自唐代起，官府大量用放贷法来筹措财源。

sentences.english: Captain, vice president of Sun Hanjun Xinqiao Hospital is four-ra ising drugs.
sentences.chinese: 队长，新桥医院副院长孙汉军更是四处筹措药品。

sentences.english: How will China raise the other $415 billion for continuous use until the end of 2010?
sentences.chinese: 剩余的4150亿美元中方将如何筹措哪？

sentences.english: That compels many company founders to rely on funds raised from relatives.
sentences.chinese: 这迫使许多公司创建者依靠从亲戚那里筹措的资金。

sentences.english: But suppose you have a program for which mobilization will take four weeks.
sentences.chinese: 但是假定你有一个规划，筹措将要花费四个星期。

sentences.english: Finance can be arranged for first-time home buyers.
sentences.chinese: 有关方面可以为初次购买房者筹措资金。

sentences.english: Li Xia need to raise a large number of drugs, but the lack of adequate funding.
sentences.chinese: 李侠需要筹措大批药品，却缺乏足够的经费。

sentences.english: The local government raised large sums for highway construction.
sentences.chinese: 地方政府为建设公路筹措了巨额款项。

sentences.english: In normal times, capital- starved companies usually can raise capital on their own.
sentences.chinese: 正常情况下，急需资本的公司通常会靠自己来筹措。

sentences.english: Huang, west chicken raising everyone eat reunion dinner.
sentences.chinese: 黄敏归来，西凤筹措人人吃团聚饭。

definition: silver currency/currency of the Qing dynasty based on the silver tael 兩|两
to deal with/to wait on/to provide for
land tax/money and grain (given as tax or tribute)
to rotate/to circulate (cash, stock etc)/turnover/circulation/cash flow
